titles: A commentarie or exposition vppon the twoo Epistles generall of Sainct Peter, and that of Sainct Jude. First faithfullie gathered out of the lectures and preachinges of that worthie instrumente in Goddes Churche, Doctour Martine Luther. And now out of Latine, for the singuler benefite and comfort of the godlie, familiarlie translated into Englishe by Thomas Newton
Enarrationes in epistolas Divi Petri duas et Iudae unam. English
author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546.
Newton, Thomas, 1542?-1607.
publisher: [By John Kingston] for Abraham Veale dwellyng in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the La[m]be,
notes: A translation of: Enarrationes in Epistolas Divi Petri duas et Judae unam.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
keywords: Bible. --  N.T. --  1 Peter --  Commentaries --  Early works to 1800.
